last_episode_to_air.name: Impossible
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Carmen's life is put in danger and she's about to be burned at the stake, her friends must give up their greatest wishes to save her.

name: Always a Witch
overview: A young 17th-century witch time travels to the future to save the man she loves, but first must adjust to present-day Cartagena and defeat a dark rival.

episodes.name: A Leap in Time
episodes.overview: While being burned at the stake in 1646 Cartagena, Carmen -- a witch and slave -- time travels to the future to save both herself and the man she loves.

episodes.name: A University Witch
episodes.overview: Suspicious of Alicia, Carmen follows her to a college class, where she tries to fit in as a student in a strange world of cellphones and social media.

episodes.name: Ouija
episodes.overview: Carmen tries to reach Aldemar via a Ouija board. Instead, a ghost who can't remember who he is appears. In the past, Cristóbal asks Aldemar for help.

episodes.name: Stolen Shadow, Witch Forgotten
episodes.overview: A preventive step is taken to protect Carmen from Lucien, but it ends up affecting her memory, personality and maybe even her sanity.

episodes.name: The Festival of Candela
episodes.overview: While her friends look for her, a lost and disoriented Carmen runs into someone from her past. Jhony Ki discovers how to communicate with Cristóbal.

episodes.name: The Ritual of Forgetting
episodes.overview: A text message on León's phone upsets Mayte. Carmen's heartbreak makes her lose control of her magic powers. Cristóbal secretly meets with Aldemar.

episodes.name: Lucien
episodes.overview: With her friends' help, Carmen tries to break the spell cast upon Mayte by rekindling León's ardor. Later, she learns Lucien's alternate identity.
After Carmen returns to Cristóbal in 1646, Aldemar travels to the present and confronts Lucien. Mayte struggles to recall what happened after her date.

episodes.name: The Time Portal
episodes.overview: One of Carmen's friends travels to the 1600s to bring her back, just as she gets caught planning a slave rebellion. Esteban faces a difficult decision.

episodes.name: The Final Trip
episodes.overview: In a final showdown, Carmen attempts to lure the Fire Killer into a trap, but an ambush awaits her. Jhony Ki receives a rare and precious gift.

episodes.name: Someone Like Me
episodes.overview: Carmen's popularity soars when her powers are displayed on social media. In the past, Johnny Ki's antics get him into trouble with Kobo, a wild pirate.

episodes.name: Leeches
episodes.overview: Amanda accuses Carmen of hurting Miguel with her witchcraft and starts a petition against her. Alicia teaches Kobo about life in 2020.

episodes.name: Antares
episodes.overview: Carmen seeks to undo the black magic curse that has been placed on her. Kobo finds a new job. Daniel begins his Mr. Hyde challenges.

episodes.name: Mr. Hyde
episodes.overview: Antares and his magic help Carmen learn more about why Amanda is attempting to sabotage her. Daniel and León's side business backfires.

episodes.name: A Crack in Time
episodes.overview: Amanda forces Daniel to take them to the time-travel portal. Carmen is suddenly dragged back into her past, where she is met by familiar faces.

episodes.name: From Student to Master
episodes.overview: When Amanda asks Carmen to train her, Alicia warns her friend not to trust her former enemy. Kobo takes action to recover his treasure.

episodes.name: One Last Wish
episodes.overview: In order for Carmen to keep her powers, she must ask her friends to make some significant sacrifices. Miguel worries about Amanda.

episodes.name: Impossible
episodes.overview: When Carmen's life is put in danger and she's about to be burned at the stake, her friends must give up their greatest wishes to save her.
